job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ISEE is seeking a full-time Machine Learning Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate has several years of work experience.<br><br><strong> Role Responsibilities Include <br></strong><ul><li> Working on the intersection of sensing and perception algorithms.</li><li> Prototyping and deploying robust computer vision algorithms on ISEE’s vehicle fleet in areas of: Sensor calibration, localization and mapping, fusion, tracking and pattern recognition.</li><li> Benchmarking and maintaining developed modules.</li><li> Work independently to deliver high-quality code in a timely fashion.</li><li> Collaborate with team for testing, evaluation and review of code.<br><br></li></ul><strong> Required Qualifications <br></strong><ul><li> Degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Robotics or related field.</li><li> Experience in deploying deep learning models at scale on real-world data in at least one of these deep learning frameworks: PyTorch, Tensorflow, Caffe.</li><li> Hands-on experience with developing, training and deploying deep learning models in multimodal (sensors space and temporal) real world data.</li><li> Strong Python and/or C++ skills.</li><li> Passionate about self-driving vehicles and real-world robotic solutions.</li><li> Strong presentation and communication skills.<br><br></li></ul><strong> Preferred <br></strong><ul><li> Publication record in top-tier computer vision or machine learning conferences.</li><li> 3+ yrs industrial experience in deploying Computer Vision/Deep learning algorithms in real-world scenarios.</li><li> Robotics/autonomous experience is a plus.</li></ul>
